topic.name: Biochemistry
topic.description: Biochemistry, sometimes called biological chemistry, is the study of chemical processes in living organisms, including, but not limited to, living matter.

topic.name: Microbiology
topic.description: Microbiology is a broad term which includes virology, mycology, parasitology, bacteriology, immunology and other branches

topic.name: Immunology
topic.description: Immunology is a branch of biomedical science that covers the study of all aspects of the immune system in all organisms

topic.name: Cell signaling
topic.description: Cell signaling is part of a complex system of communication that governs basic cellular activities and coordinates cell actions

topic.name: Molecular diagnostics
topic.description: Molecular diagnostics assess your biological makeup at the genetic level.
